ValidationRule.description: Employee Count, Frequency, Industry and Payroll Current-Prior Method are required when Profiling a Prospect. Will only fire when one of these fields are updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')),Profiled__c = True, RecordTypeId = '012500000000nCj',OR( ISPICKVAL( Current_Prior_Method__c ,'Unknown' ),ISPICKVAL( Current_Prior_Method__c ,'None' ) ), OR( ISBLANK(NumberOfEmployees), ISBLANK(TEXT(Frequency__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Industry)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Current_Prior_Method__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Employee Count, Frequency, Industry and Payroll Current-Prior Method are required when Qualifying a Prospect.
